message: I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  It's a fair starting point, and I'm hoping we can find a solution we both like!
Your offer was a bit too skewed in your favor, Alice. Let's be reasonable - I propose a 55/45 split. We can still avoid significant losses from inflation.
Let's be fair.  I propose a 50/50 split. This way, we can both get the most out of this deal before inflation eats away at our earnings.
